title: Lesson 07 - One Minute German
description: In lesson 7 of One Minute German you will learn how to say that it's nice to meet someone. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.

itunes:subtitle: Learn to say it's nice to meet someone
